comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Not Surf Avenue, but Bowery. The large brick building in the distance on the left hand side of the street is Henderson's Musical Theater. The photographer in the linked picture is standing up against Henderson's, looking in the same direction, and the marquee shows the same acts in both photos. The scene today, per Google Maps, is comparitively grim: maps.google.com/maps?q=coney+island+bowery+map&ll=40....

comment.author: 28853714@N05
comment._content: The money is not in restaurants or vending or attractions - its in selling straw hats!
